title: "3 Ways AI Will Help Restaurants Reduce Costs"
excerpt: "Pressured by inflationary increases in food, labor, and other costs, operators of quick-serve restaurants are forced to raise menu prices and risk the chances of losing sales. Quick-service restaurants seldom have the ability to hide price increases in the so-called “temporary” fees that are growing more common at full-service restaurants,"
